TopicTitle: [1.9.*, 1.10.*, 1.11.*] DockRotate - lightweight robotics - rotational control on docking ports (plus NodeRotate, make any part rotate)

Articles.Content:
Hi there,

I just installed this mod in an existing game to align some parts of a station. For some ports this seem to work, however, for the next station I get a red warning, that something is wrong with the docking ports and i should check the log.

Did so, but there is a lot of jibberish in there, that I do not understand. How do I read this and what do I make out of this? Is there a wiki?
No wiki yet, @chris-kerbal, but if you share your log I'll be happy to help.

9 minutes ago, peteletroll said:

No wiki yet, @chris-kerbal, but if you share your log I'll be happy to help.

Thanks a lot!
I got the following. I think it has to do something with "same vessel" however no clue on how to interpret this or what to do about it:

@chris-kerbal, here's a test release: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1bdYi_dRRl7jfLK-lTq_MykLGC0rzthwh/view?usp=sharing

This could solve your problem. Let me know how it works.

55 minutes ago, peteletroll said:

@chris-kerbal, here's a test release: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1bdYi_dRRl7jfLK-lTq_MykLGC0rzthwh/view?usp=sharing

This could solve your problem. Let me know how it works.

@peteletroll Thanks for the quick reaction.

I went back to the vessel and got an error message again, however only on one port. Also I could then select the port and correct the rotation. This was not possible with the old version (It would always switch back to old orientation). When then leaving the scene and coming back, no error message was displayed any more.

So it seems to have worked, even if I needed to get to the vessel twice to have no error message.

You can find the logs of this here: https://pastebin.com/74nz0e0y
Thanks @chris-kerbal, I'll release a new version soon™.

New release!

More docking port fixing, and a hopefully more readable report in the log.

I tested it a LOT, so it should be safe. For extra safety, disable the docking state fixing by changing "enabledFix = True" to "enabledFix = False" in GameData/PluginData/DockingStateChecker.cfg

I cannot get it to work, instead only the options to determine the rotation step and rotation speed show up, but no option to actually rotate the dock shows up.

https://imgur.com/a/ZpaAwpl
@sergih123, the rotation controls appear only when two ports of the same size are docked together.

@peteletroll I run into docking issues a lot when I use the KerboArm from Shuttle Orbiter Construction Kit to grab the grapple pins on my spacecraft. Prior versions of DockRotate reported the error but couldn't fix it, and no doubt it's a very tricky problem, so thank you much for your continued development and improvements of your mod to help alleviate the frustrations we all go through. Also, Dock Rotate is perfect for rotating the Mk-33's strongback from horizontal to vertical:

This mod is an essential must-have in my game.
@Angel-125, I'm actually hunting for problematic docking states that happen in real game. If you find something DR can't fix, let me know, and send logs.
Do you need anything more about the problem I reported above?
@damerell, have you tried the last release? It If it doesn't work, send logs, as usual.

@peteletroll Have you seen this yet?
 

Vali says they tried rotate for port alignment, but for whatever reason, didnt implement it, I forgot...

I guess I'm asking if you foresee any mod conflict with using DockRotate at the same time? vOv
 

Edited September 26, 2020 by Stone Blue
Smart docking aid works before docking, DockRotate after: they never work at the same time. I see no possible conflict.

Ok, here's what happens:

My station arm has latched onto the PDGF after I undocked the module from the shuttle.

I logged the details here:

Edited September 27, 2020 by Angel-125
@Angel-125, this is weird. DockRotate finds no problem, and I suppose you see no red message. Do you see malfunctions, or just those warnings from KML?

On 9/26/2020 at 8:29 PM, peteletroll said:

@damerell, have you tried the last release? It If it doesn't work, send logs, as usual.

Sorry. Sometimes I'm not quite sure if the person I reported a bug to knows fine it's still there and I'll just be pestering them, or if they're cursing my inability to supply any more facts.

However, I'm pleased to report it works exactly as I expected now with v1.10.1.50, both in an otherwise bare KSP 1.10 install and in a modded 1.9 install.

6 hours ago, peteletroll said:

@Angel-125, this is weird. DockRotate finds no problem, and I suppose you see no red message. Do you see malfunctions, or just those warnings from KML?

I'm unable to undock the arm or PDGF without using KML to reset the ports. It happens frequently for me.
